Pre-Game Insights: Steve Clarke's squad have faltered since securing back-to-back qualifications for the European Championship
Gibraltar conceded some 20 goals across their final two qualifiers
Gibraltar's dismal end to European Championship qualification left them in no frame of mind to tackle their UEFA Nations League playout in March
Scotland are likely to find the net multiple times in southern Portugal
Lyndon Dykes is stretchered off during training and may join a long injury list
Gibraltar have injected fresh blood into their squad by calling up six players without a senior cap
Miscellaneous Highlights: Scotland seek an end to their long winless streak on Monday evening
Gibraltar will play Wales on Thursday after facing Scotland
Gibraltar have lost 12 games since the start of 2023 with zero goals and 48 conceded
Scotland have lost seven games in a row without a victory
